mita awurudu gananawakata kalin ape gedarata udahin palu idamak thibune.badda aarunama meke thibune awurudu ganak parana naki wechcha jambu gahak witharayi.ithin meken thamayi athu badima magin palayak hada ganna mama kalpana kale.mulinma mama gase aswanu dena kalin para gedith haduna pansalaka mahathen yuktha aththak thora gaththa.eeta passe hoda aluth bled thalayak aragena ara aththe pothu walayak ayin kara.meka agal bagayak withara palalata watetama iwath karanna oona.dan hodata aalena ganata wathura dala anagaththu kompost pohora guliyak athata aragena ara pothu walaya ayin karapu thanata thiyala thada karala kalu polithin ekakin sampurna sthanayama thada wenna othala depaththen gata dekak yodanna oona.onna wade iwarayi.miniththu 10 yayi okkotama. ..........

epamanak nowa ehi dinum andima siduwana data pasu dinama ehi prawesha pathra adala jayagrahakayanta yawimata da ohu piyawara gena thibini.thusitha siya karya bahula wruththiya jiwithaya athara siya pasale aadi kridakayange sangamaye samajikayaku lesa da katayuthu karamin ee sadaha anagi mehayak kala baw apa danimu.pasugiya wakawanuwe sinama karmanthaye chithrapata pradarshanaye di madihathwim aadiye di thusitha siya aayathanaya wenuwen wehesa wiya.ohu hamawitama thama aayathanaya wenuwen peni sitime durlabha gunangayen yuktha wiya.wruththiyen wishrama giya da sinamawen wishrama yannata boho denekuta nohakiya.sarasawiya ha hithawath thusitha ta eepilibanda apamathak kara dimata kamaththemu.arjun
